extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Andr√© Luiz Alexandrini - SimpleFileTXT is a simple class to use in text document. You can to write a new documents and read in a simple form.

        public static SimpleFileTXT setFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Method Level 1 In this method, you set just a File Name(directory and file name). The file to begin in a READ and WRITE mode, but this method don't create a new file case this file not exists.

      • writeData

        public void writeData(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data)
        This method receive of parameter a ArrayList of String. Each element of the ArrayList is a line in text archive.

      • readData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readData()
        This method return a ArrayList of String. Each element of the ArrayList is a line in text archive.
